text: The Hobart Hurricanes are an Australian professional men's cricket team from Hobart that plays in the Big Bash League (BBL). They play their home games at Bellerive Oval in Hobart and at York Park in Launceston. ==Players== ===Current squad=== The current squad of the Hobart Hurricanes for the 2023–24 Big Bash League season as of 7 September 2023. * Players with international caps are listed in bold. Name Nationality Date of birth (age) Batting style Bowling style Notes Batters 8 Tim David Right-handed Right-arm off spin 32 Caleb Jewell Left-handed — 33 Mac Wright Right-handed Right-arm leg spin 27 Sam Hain Right-handed Right-arm off Break All Rounders 78 Corey Anderson Left- handed Left-arm Medium Wicket-keepers 28 Ben McDermott Right-handed — 13 Matthew Wade Left-handed Right-arm medium Pace bowlers 72 Nathan Ellis Right- handed Right-arm fast-medium Captain 16 Mitchell Owen Right-handed Right-arm fast medium 21 Riley Meredith Right-handed Right-arm fast 37 Billy Stanlake Left-handed Right-arm fast 34 Chris Jordan Right-handed Right-arm Fast Medium Spin bowlers 48 Patrick Dooley Left-handed Right-arm leg spin ==References== Category:Big Bash League teams Hurricanes
title: Hobart Hurricanes
